How can I capture the standard output of test?  I need to check that the me=
ssages from the class I'm testing are correct.  For example if my class cla=
ss calls a parser that print "invalid input at line xx" when it fails, I wa=
nt to be able go catch that output and compare it to the expected value.  I=
f it could be directed to a file on a per-test basis, I could do a diff to =
check it.

Any suggestions would be appreciated.

Thanks,

Jim Cant
